BrandName.title: Brand Name
BrandName.description: Configures the name shown in the navigation menu.

BrandColor.title: Brand Color
BrandColor.description: Configures the brand color shown in the app, available colors are: Blue, Green, Red, Orange. Defaults to Blue if not configured.

SupportUrl.title: Support Page URL
SupportUrl.description: Configures the URL to open when the user clicks on the Get Support button.

ChangePasswordUrl.title: Change Password URL
ChangePasswordUrl.description: Configures the URL to open when the user clicks on the Change Password button.

ChangePasswordMode.title: Change Password Mode
ChangePasswordMode.description: Configures the mode for the Change Password button, available modes are: local, SSOExtension, url. Defaults to local if not configured.

SupportEmail.title: Support Email
SupportEmail.description: Configures the email address shown when the user clicks on the Support Info button.

SupportPhone.title: Support Phone
SupportPhone.description: Configures the phone number shown when the user clicks on the Support Info button.

HiddenWidgets.title: Hidden Widgets
HiddenWidgets.description: Configures which widgets to hide, available widgets are: DeviceInfo, MunkiPendingApps, MunkiUpdates, IntunePendingApps, IntuneUpdates, Storage, MdmStatus, Actions, Battery, EvergreenInfo.

HiddenActions.title: Hidden Actions
HiddenActions.description: Configures which actions to hide, available actions are: Support, ManagedSoftwareCenter, ChangePassword, Reboot, KillAgent, SoftwareUpdates, GatherLogs.

NotificationInterval.title: Notification Interval
NotificationInterval.description: Configures the interval for notifications in hours for Application Updates and Software Updates notifications.

NotificationTitle.title: Notification Title
NotificationTitle.description: Configures the title for notifications for notifications. Defaults to Support Companion if not configured.

NotificationImage.title: Notification Image
NotificationImage.description: Configures an image to add to notifications. Local path should be specified.

SoftwareUpdateNotificationMessage.title: Software Update Notification Message
SoftwareUpdateNotificationMessage.description: Configures the message for notifications for Software Updates notifications. Defaults to "You have software updates available. Take action now! \ud83c\udf89" if not configured.

SoftwareUpdateNotificationButtonText.title: Software Update Notification Button Text
SoftwareUpdateNotificationButtonText.description: Configures the button text for notifications for Software Updates notifications. Defaults to "Details \ud83d\udc40" if not configured.

AppUpdateNotificationMessage.title: App Update Notification Message
AppUpdateNotificationMessage.description: Configures the message for notifications for App Updates notifications. Defaults to "You have app updates available. Take action now! \ud83c\udf89" if not configured.

AppUpdateNotificationButtonText.title: App Update Notification Button Text
AppUpdateNotificationButtonText.description: Configures the button text for notifications for App Updates notifications. Defaults to "Details \ud83d\udc40" if not configured.

PrimaryColor.title: Primary Color
PrimaryColor.description: Configures the Primary Color for the app.

AccentColor.title: Accent Color
AccentColor.description: Configures the Accent Color for the app.

CustomColors.title: Custom Colors
CustomColors.description: Configures custom colors for the app, should be specified in hex format, see example below. Do not use BrandColor in conjunction with this key.

IntuneMode.title: Intune Mode
IntuneMode.description: Configures the app to use Intune for application information. Only supports PKG and DMG type apps, not LOB.

LogFolders.title: Log Folders
LogFolders.description: Configures the log folders to gather logs from. Only used when gathering logs. Defaults to "/Library/Logs/Microsoft" if not configured.

Name.title: Name
Name.description: Name of the action to show in the menu.

Command.title: Command
Command.description: Command to run when to item is clicked.

Actions.title: Actions
Actions.description: Configures custom actions to add to the tray menu. See example below.
